nodes.text: Slugthrowers: An Overview of Popular Music and Musicians in a Galaxy Far, Far Away

Slugthrowers: An Overview of Popular Music and Musicians in a Galaxy Far, Far Away is a series of reference articles currently ongoing at the StarWars.com blogs. Written by Ed Erdelac, it pertains to the music styles and musicians from the Star Wars universe. Part 1 was released on November 21, 2013. Part 2 was released on January 21, 2014.
